languages.text: {n}Управляемые вагонетки, нагруженные взрывчаткой, были посланы в опасные туннели. Многие сетовали, что обвалы, вызванные ими, будут недостаточно обширны, и враг сможет вновь отыскать путь в колонию.{/n}

{n}Remotely controlled trolleys loaded with explosives were sent into the dangerous tunnels. Many lamented that the cave-ins from the explosions would not cover enough ground, and that the enemy would be able to find their way back to the colony yet again.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Управляемые вагонетки, нагруженные взрывчаткой, были посланы в опасные туннели. Многие сетовали, что обвалы, вызванные ими, будут недостаточно обширны, и враг сможет вновь отыскать путь в колонию.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The remotely controlled trolleys loaded with explosives have been sent into the dangerous tunnels. Many people lamented that the cave-ins caused by them would not be big enough, and the enemy would be able to find their way back to the colony yet again.{/n}

{n}The remotely controlled trolleys loaded with explosives have been sent into the dangerous tunnels. Many people lamented that the cave-ins caused by them would not be big enough, and the enemy would be able to find their way back to the colony yet again.{/n}

{n}Remotely controlled trolleys loaded with explosives were sent into the dangerous tunnels. Many lamented that the cave-ins from the explosions would not cover enough ground, and that the enemy would be able to find their way back to the colony yet again.{/n}

languages.text: {n}装满炸药的遥控小车驶入了危险的隧道之中。许多人哀叹爆炸造成的塌方面积不够大，那些敌人肯定还能再次找到返回殖民地的道路。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Remotely controlled trolleys loaded with explosives were sent into the dangerous tunnels. Many lamented that the cave-ins from the explosions would not cover enough ground, and that the enemy would be able to find their way back to the colony yet again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}装满炸药的遥控小车驶入了危险的隧道之中。许多人哀叹爆炸造成的塌方面积不够大，那些敌人肯定还能再次找到返回殖民地的道路。{/n}
{n}装满炸药的遥控小车驶入了危险的隧道之中。许多人哀叹爆炸造成的塌方还不够严重，那些敌人肯定还能再次找到返回殖民地的道路。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Se enviaron vehículos por control remoto cargados de explosivos a los peligrosos túneles. Muchos temían que los derrumbes de estas explosiones no cubrieran terreno suficiente y que el enemigo encontrara otra ruta para atacar la colonia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Remotely controlled trolleys loaded with explosives were sent into the dangerous tunnels. Many lamented that the cave-ins from the explosions would not cover enough ground, and that the enemy would be able to find their way back to the colony yet again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Se enviaron vehículos por control remoto cargados de explosivos a los peligrosos túneles. Muchos temían que los derrumbes de estas explosiones no cubrieran terreno suficiente y que el enemigo encontrara otra ruta para atacar la colonia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}爆発物を積んだ遠隔操作のトロリーが、危険なトンネルへと送り込まれた。爆発による陥没は十分な大きさではなかったため、敵は再びコロニーへとやって来る道を見つけることができるではないかと多くの者が嘆いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Remotely controlled trolleys loaded with explosives were sent into the dangerous tunnels. Many lamented that the cave-ins from the explosions would not cover enough ground, and that the enemy would be able to find their way back to the colony yet again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}爆発物を積んだ遠隔操作のトロリーが、危険なトンネルへと送り込まれた。爆発による陥没は十分な大きさではなかったため、敵は再びコロニーへとやって来る道を見つけることができるではないかと多くの者が嘆いた。{/n}
{n}爆発物を積んだ遠隔操作のトロリーが、危険なトンネルへと送り込まれた。爆発による陥没は十分な大きさではなかったため、敵は再びコロニーへとやって来る道を見つけることができるではないかと多くの者が嘆いた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Des chariots d'explosifs, contrôlés à distance, sont envoyés dans les tunnels. Beaucoup se plaignent que les effondrements provoqués par les explosions ne suffiront pas à empêcher l'ennemi d'attaquer la colonie à nouveau.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Remotely controlled trolleys loaded with explosives were sent into the dangerous tunnels. Many lamented that the cave-ins from the explosions would not cover enough ground, and that the enemy would be able to find their way back to the colony yet again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Des chariots d'explosifs, contrôlés à distance, sont envoyés dans les tunnels. Beaucoup se plaignent que les effondrements provoqués par les explosions ne suffiront pas à empêcher l'ennemi d'attaquer la colonie à nouveau.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ferngesteuerte Loren mit Sprengstoff wurden in die gefährlichen Tunnel geschickt. Viele befürchteten, dass die Explosionen nicht ausreichen würden und der Feind erneut einen Weg in die Kolonie finden könnte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Remotely controlled trolleys loaded with explosives were sent into the dangerous tunnels. Many lamented that the cave-ins from the explosions would not cover enough ground, and that the enemy would be able to find their way back to the colony yet again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ferngesteuerte Loren mit Sprengstoff wurden in die gefährlichen Tunnel geschickt. Viele befürchteten, dass die Explosionen nicht ausreichen würden und der Feind erneut einen Weg in die Kolonie finden könnte.{/n}

{n}Die ferngesteuerten Loren mit Sprengstoff wurden in die gefährlichen Tunnel geschickt. Viele befürchteten, dass die Blockade durch den explosionsbedingten Einsturz der Tunnel nicht ausreichen werde und dass Feind doch wieder seinen Weg zurück in die Kolonie finden würde.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Patlayıcılarla yüklü arabalar, uzaktan kontrol edilerek tehlikeli tünellere gönderildi. Patlamalardan sonra oluşacak göçüklerin yeterli gelmeyeceğini düşünenler, düşmanın koloniye tekrar dönebileceğini belirtiyordu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Remotely controlled trolleys loaded with explosives were sent into the dangerous tunnels. Many lamented that the cave-ins from the explosions would not cover enough ground, and that the enemy would be able to find their way back to the colony yet again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Patlayıcılarla yüklü arabalar, uzaktan kontrol edilerek tehlikeli tünellere gönderildi. Patlamalardan sonra oluşacak göçüklerin yeterli gelmeyeceğini düşünenler, düşmanın koloniye tekrar dönebileceğini belirtiyordu.{/n}
